title: Plant Profile Template
description: Defines a single invented plant species including its classification, habitat, appearance, uses, and cultural significance. Every plant should have a clear purpose in the world (food, medicine, poison, spell component, etc.).
source_chapter: V1 Ch6 -- Creating Plants and Animals

earth_analogue.description: Earth plant used as inspiration (private notes, not shown to audience)

habitat.description: Climate zone and terrain where this plant is found

season.description: When this plant grows, flowers, or is harvestable

taste.description: What the plant tastes like (if edible)

useful_parts.description: Which parts are useful (leaves, stem, seeds, roots, pulp, flowers, bark, sap)

preparation_required.description: How to prepare the plant for use (crushing, boiling, drying, fermenting, distilling)

uses.description: How this plant is used by inhabitants

where_found.description: Specific locations where this plant grows (climate zones, terrains, near specific features)

reputation.description: Stories or beliefs associated with this plant

x-cross-references.products-to-source-mapping: This plant may be a source in the Products-to-Source Mapping
x-cross-references.land-feature-catalog: This plant grows in specific land features
x-cross-references.climate-zone-reference: This plant grows in specific climate zones
x-cross-references.species-profile: Species that use or cultivate this plant
x-cross-references.spell-design: This plant may be a spell component
